
Two users encrypted secrets with RSA, unknowingly sharing a prime. Can you exploit this flaw to recover the hidden flag from 396200334020842743706315182636859282719874537816351469202669110382504328367911327453979933082102968160644418883233914275482666807559996100625915148691983031173000587661667724913873653571456860011142284255953431751429228252050855385?


The flag format is flag{...}
n=614306361862497627374428518727803875044461221345901793133309012535886215375092224895093522816115544613926398640196009085825918451271103868827090522466029941325849257801760722691661568007248618880396825337890337439035612128081735683, n2=672926911491743575280923763038184715405513016258596328206851186401288741206486991805060335450080561723798273942805534502885278181508342821742022481619152694824487814808158903309852859601774914286187799812686427761725447254276485127, e=525437846749649487036246665263561171853449573671703500062248876537136545628982215937575431517074022392028508066716907062823978108188263652548095358428940716225219613290135426536036068740764696929878562703181749059149812258487254987

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{qk50bzmv}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 396200334020842743706315182636859282719874537816351469202669110382504328367911327453979933082102968160644418883233914275482666807559996100625915148691983031173000587661667724913873653571456860011142284255953431751429228252050855385
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=614306361862497627374428518727803875044461221345901793133309012535886215375092224895093522816115544613926398640196009085825918451271103868827090522466029941325849257801760722691661568007248618880396825337890337439035612128081735683, n2=672926911491743575280923763038184715405513016258596328206851186401288741206486991805060335450080561723798273942805534502885278181508342821742022481619152694824487814808158903309852859601774914286187799812686427761725447254276485127, e=525437846749649487036246665263561171853449573671703500062248876537136545628982215937575431517074022392028508066716907062823978108188263652548095358428940716225219613290135426536036068740764696929878562703181749059149812258487254987
extra_info: p=23048357300514379497272100252500308511547705842316151016560998999823263903637638076829169981273059699846120544548491, q=26652934690872216920522641630416324171530222055121557199423290094641272760203581472877454329971164407887986789438313, q2=29196306822123310005071727342035981896639315797976541170620992784934065957139713296151582559730995332691566124996597, φ(n)=614306361862497627374428518727803875044461221345901793133309012535886215375092224895093522816115544613926398640195959384533927064674686074085207605833346863397951820093544738402567103470584777660847118713579093214927878020747748880, φ(n2)=672926911491743575280923763038184715405513016258596328206851186401288741206486991805060335450080561723798273942805482258221155543818840477914427945328744507802847522115971721318068102271914136934814819060145423706692909567606940040
subtype: shared_prime
archetype: rsa
